all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
And he shall be called Jesus Christ, the Son of God, the Father of heaven and earth, the Creator of all things from the beginning; and his mother shall be called Mary.
Mosiah 3:8
Quote of the Day
"As we embrace [the] gift of reverence for sacred things … we will be filled with astounding amazement and awe."
Elder Ulisses Soares | 1 Apr 2025General Conference
